description: ff. 81. 172 x 130; 115 x 94 mm. 11 lin. Rabīʻ II, 827. Acephalous biography of al-Rifāʻī, d. 578/1182, divided into unnumbered faṣl, of which the first complete one begins on fol. 1a, line 10: ... فصل کان سىدى احمد قدس روحه کثىر البر بأمه Explicit: ... فبلغتهم بذلك غاىة المراد والمقصود نجز ذلك والحمد لله وحده ...
title: Manāqib al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Rifāʻī.
subject: Rifāʻī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī, 1106?-1182
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
